name: You and I: The Hope of Our Kind
name_original: You and I: The Hope of Our Kind
description:
Game Description:

The game is a narrative platformer with a hint of puzzle elements where the player controls two characters which are named Human and Seed. 

Both characters need to help out each other with their respective strengths to get through each level riddled with environmental obstacles.

Team:

Artist

Virgil Ronel Cuttermas

Justine Lee

Programmers
